ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Ambrina Nadia Butt has been working in the IT occupational sector with no real industrical experience. Currently this candidate is employed as an Informatica Developer at MetLife INC. Ambrina has extensive knowledge of Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, shell scripting, Teradata, Stored Procedures, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Informatica, ETL, SQL Server Integration Services, Oracle PL/SQL, Oracle 9i, GUI Applications, Cognos Impromptu, XML, Triggers, TOAD, Microsoft Excel, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, UNIX, SDRC I-Deas, Regression Testing, Microsoft .NET Technology, Mercury Quality Center, Lotus Notes/Domino, Database Administration, DM. So far Ambrina has not gained any managerial experience.
